Description: Responsibilities To provide registration, reservation, cancellation and report printing services as per customer requirement consistent with the company’s standards Review feedback forms related to complaints and/or suggestion from the customers as per the procedure to ensure that management is aware of customers’ needs. Ensure that inspection equipment and tools are maintained in good condition by the inspectors, to ensure availability and smooth operations of inspection activities.Skills
Skills: 6-8 years’ experience in automobile / vehicle repair / inspection with at least 3 years holding a supervisory role
Diploma in mechanical / automobile mechanics or equivalent
